results.title: Effect of atenolol pre-treatment in heart damage in a model of intestinal ischemia-reperfusion.
results.text_hl: METHODS: Adult Wistar male @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were randomly (n=8), anesthetized and divided in: Sham: submitted to operation only; group SS+IR: intravenous saline infusion following @<m>DISEASE_Superior_Mesenteric_Artery_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013478 @@@superior mesenteric artery occlusion@@@ during 60 minutes (@DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@) and open for 120 minutes (reperfusion); group AT+IR: intravenous @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ infusion (2 mg/kg) following @<m>DISEASE_Superior_Mesenteric_Artery_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013478 @@@superior mesenteric artery occlusion@@@ during 60 minutes (@DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@) and open for 120 minutes (reperfusion); and group AT+I+AT+R: intravenous @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ infusion following @<m>DISEASE_Superior_Mesenteric_Artery_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013478 @@@superior mesenteric artery occlusion@@@ during 60 minutes (@DISEASE_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007511 @@@ischemia@@@) and in the time 45 minutes other @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ doses were administrated and the artery was open for 120 minutes (reperfusion), all animals were submitted to muscular relaxation for mechanical ventilation.

citations.NLM: Okada M, Falcão LFR, Ferez D, Martins JL, Errante PR, Rodrigues FSM, Caricati-Neto A, Marinho M, Fenelon G, Oliveira-Júnior IS. Effect of atenolol pre-treatment in heart damage in a model of intestinal ischemia-reperfusion. Acta Cir Bras. 2017 Nov;32(11):964-972. PMID: 29236801
citations.BibTeX: @article{29236801, title={Effect of atenolol pre-treatment in heart damage in a model of intestinal ischemia-reperfusion.}, author={Okada M and Falcão LFR and Ferez D and Martins JL and Errante PR and Rodrigues FSM and Caricati-Neto A and Marinho M and Fenelon G and Oliveira-Júnior IS}, journal={Acta Cir Bras}, volume={32}, number={11}, pages={964-972}}
